values.help: For parameters of 101 ~ 103, power, energy detection mode configuration
values.label: Power, energy detection mode

values.help: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic.
values.label: Selective reporting

values.help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).
values.label: Wattage Threshold Whole HEM

values.help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).
values.label: Wattage Threshold C1

values.help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).
values.label: Wattage Threshold C2

values.help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).
values.label: Wattage Threshold C3

values.help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).
values.label: Wattage Percentage Change Whole HEM

values.help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).
values.label: Wattage Percentage Change C1

values.help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).
values.label: Wattage Percentage Change C2

values.help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).
values.label: Wattage Percentage Change C3

values.help: Enable /disable reporting CRC-16 Encapsulation Command.
values.label: Reporting CRC-16 Encapsulation Command

values.help: Reset to default parameters number 101-103. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.
values.label: Reset #101-103

values.help:
Which reports need to send in group1. Format is as follows:
				Byte 1 (msb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 2:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 3:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 4 (lsb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
values.label: Group 1 Reports

values.help:
Which reports need to send in group2. Format is as follows:
				Byte 1 (msb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 2:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 3:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 4 (lsb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
values.label: Group 2 Reports

values.help:
Which reports need to send in group3. Format is as follows:
				Byte 1 (msb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 2:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 3:
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1)
				Byte 4 (lsb):
				Bit 7: Reserved
				Bit 6: Reserved
				Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
				Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)
values.label: Group 3 Reports
